languages.text: {n}Абеляр отвечает не сразу: вы видите, как гуляют его желваки, как старый офицер бесплодно силится начать говорить. Наконец, одернув окровавленный китель и выпрямившись, сенешаль произносит:{/n} "Как Первый офицер, я обязан... я обязан уведомить вас, с величайшим прискорбием и неизбывным трауром в душе, что Лорд-капитан Теодора фон Валанциус мертва. Да хранится вечно память ее в анналах династии".

traits.locale_text: {n}Абеляр отвечает не сразу: вы видите, как гуляют его желваки, как старый офицер бесплодно силится начать говорить. Наконец, одернув окровавленный китель и выпрямившись, сенешаль начинает чеканить:{/n} "Первый офицер Абеляр Версериан уполномочен уведомить офицерский состав... с величайшим прискорбием и неизбывным трауром в душе я сообщаю о преждевременной кончине Лорд-капитана Теодоры фон Валанциус, Вольного Торговца на службе Империума. Да хранится вечно память ее в анналах династии".

languages.text: {n}It takes time for Abelard to respond: you watch as he grits his teeth, unable to bring himself to say anything. Finally, he adjusts his blood-stained coat, straightens, and begins to speak,{/n} "As First Officer, it is my duty... to inform you, with the greatest regret and indelible sorrow, that Lord Captain Theodora von Valancius is dead. May her memory never fade from the annals of the dynasty."
languages.original_text: {n}Абеляр отвечает не сразу: вы видите, как гуляют его желваки, как старый офицер бесплодно силится начать говорить. Наконец, одернув окровавленный китель и выпрямившись, сенешаль произносит:{/n} "Как Первый офицер, я обязан... я обязан уведомить вас, с величайшим прискорбием и неизбывным трауром в душе, что Лорд-капитан Теодора фон Валанциус мертва. Да хранится вечно память ее в анналах династии".

traits.locale_text: {n}It takes time for Abelard to respond: you watch as he grits his teeth, unable to bring himself to say anything. Finally, he adjusts his blood-stained coat, straightens, and begins to speak,{/n} "First Officer Abelard Werserian is authorised to inform the officers... It is my greatest regret and indelible sorrow to inform you of the untimely passing of Lord Captain Theodora von Valancius, Rogue Trader in the service of the Imperium. May the memory of her never fade from the annals of the dynasty."

May the memory of her never fade from the annals of the dynasty."

Finally, he adjusts his blood-stained coat, straightens, and begins to speak,{/n} "As First Officer, it is my duty... to inform you, with the greatest regret and indelible sorrow, that Lord Captain Theodora von Valancius is dead. May her memory never fade from the annals of the dynasty."

languages.text: {n}阿贝拉德花了很长时间才给出回答。你看到他紧紧地咬住牙关，一句话都说不出来。过了很久，他才正了正沾满了血迹的外套，挺直了身子，开了口。{/n}“身为这艘船的大副，我必须行使……我的责任。我怀着无上的遗憾与悲痛通知各位，西奥多拉·冯·瓦兰修斯领主舰长已不幸遇难。愿她的光辉事迹永远不会从王朝的史册上褪色。”
languages.original_text: {n}It takes time for Abelard to respond: you watch as he grits his teeth, unable to bring himself to say anything. Finally, he adjusts his blood-stained coat, straightens, and begins to speak,{/n} "As First Officer, it is my duty... to inform you, with the greatest regret and indelible sorrow, that Lord Captain Theodora von Valancius is dead. May her memory never fade from the annals of the dynasty."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿贝拉德花了很长时间才给出回答。你看到他紧紧地咬住牙关，一句话都说不出来。过了很久，他才正了正沾满了血迹的外套，挺直了身子，开了口。{/n}“阿贝拉德·韦尔森大副授权通知各位军官……我怀着无上的遗憾与悲痛通知各位，效忠于帝国的行商浪人，西奥多拉·冯·瓦兰修斯领主舰长已不幸去世。愿她的光辉事迹永远不会从王朝的史册上褪色。”

languages.text: {n}Abelard tarda un poco en responder. Ves cómo aprieta los dientes, incapaz de decir nada. Finalmente, se recoloca el abrigo manchado de sangre, se estira y empieza a hablar:{/n} «Como primer oficial, es mi deber... Con una pena inconmensurable y un dolor indeleble, debo informarles del prematuro fallecimiento de la Lord Capitán Theodora von Valancius. Que su recuerdo nunca desaparezca de los anales de la dinastía».
languages.original_text: {n}It takes time for Abelard to respond: you watch as he grits his teeth, unable to bring himself to say anything. Finally, he adjusts his blood-stained coat, straightens, and begins to speak,{/n} "As First Officer, it is my duty... to inform you, with the greatest regret and indelible sorrow, that Lord Captain Theodora von Valancius is dead. May her memory never fade from the annals of the dynasty."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard tarda un poco en responder. Ves cómo aprieta los dientes, incapaz de decir nada. Finalmente, se recoloca el abrigo manchado de sangre, se estira y empieza a hablar:{/n} «El primer oficial Abelard Werserian está autorizado para informar a los oficiales... Con una pena inconmensurable y un dolor indeleble, es mi deber informarles del prematuro fallecimiento de la Lord Capitán Theodora von Valancius, Comerciante Independiente al servicio del Imperium. Que su recuerdo nunca desaparezca de los anales de la dinastía».

languages.text: {n}アベラルドは答えに時間がかかっている。彼が何も言えずに歯を食いしばっているのをあなたは見守る。最後に、彼は血に染まった上着を整え、姿勢を正し、話し始めた。{/n}「第一士官としての義務として…これほど辛いことはありません。誠に残念ながら、シオドーラ・フォン・ヴァランシウス様、ロード・キャプテンが亡くなられたことをお伝えします。王朝の歴史からあの方の思い出が消えることがありませんように」
languages.original_text: {n}It takes time for Abelard to respond: you watch as he grits his teeth, unable to bring himself to say anything. Finally, he adjusts his blood-stained coat, straightens, and begins to speak,{/n} "As First Officer, it is my duty... to inform you, with the greatest regret and indelible sorrow, that Lord Captain Theodora von Valancius is dead. May her memory never fade from the annals of the dynasty."

traits.locale_text: {n}アベラルドは答えに時間がかかっている。彼が何も言えずに歯を食いしばっているのをあなたは見守る。最後に、彼は血に染まった上着を整え、姿勢を正し、話し始めた。{/n}「アベラルド・ウェルザリアン第一士官は士官たちに告知する権限を持つ…帝国にお仕えだったローグトレーダー、テオドラ・フォン・ヴァランシウス、ロード・キャプテンの時ならぬ逝去をお知らせすることは、私の最大の無念あり、一生消えることのない悲しみです。王朝の歴史から彼女の思い出が消えることがありませんように」
{n}アベラルドは答えに時間がかかっている。彼が何も言えずに歯を食いしばっているのをあなたは見守る。最後に、彼は血に染まった上着を整え、姿勢を正し、話し始めた。{/n}「第一士官としての義務として…これほど辛いことはありません。誠に残念ながら、シオドーラ・フォン・ヴァランシウス様、ロード・キャプテンが亡くなられたことをお伝えします。王朝の歴史からあの方の思い出が消えることがありませんように」

languages.original_text: {n}It takes time for Abelard to respond: you watch as he grits his teeth, unable to bring himself to say anything. Finally, he adjusts his blood-stained coat, straightens, and begins to speak,{/n} "As First Officer, it is my duty... it is my duty to inform you, with the greatest regret and indelible sorrow, that Lord Captain Theodora von Valancius is dead. May her memory never fade from the annals of the dynasty."

languages.text: {n}Abélard prend son temps avant de répondre. Vous le voyez serrer les dents, sans trouver la force de dire quoi que ce soit. Pour finir, il ajuste son manteau taché de sang, se redresse et prend la parole :{/n} « En tant que second, il est de mon devoir de... C'est avec le plus grand regret et une tristesse infinie que je me vois dans l'obligation de vous apprendre le décès de la seigneure-capitaine Théodora. Que son souvenir reste à jamais gravé dans les annales de la dynastie. »
languages.original_text: {n}It takes time for Abelard to respond: you watch as he grits his teeth, unable to bring himself to say anything. Finally, he adjusts his blood-stained coat, straightens, and begins to speak,{/n} "As First Officer, it is my duty... to inform you, with the greatest regret and indelible sorrow, that Lord Captain Theodora von Valancius is dead. May her memory never fade from the annals of the dynasty."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abélard prend son temps avant de répondre. Vous le voyez serrer les dents, sans trouver la force de dire quoi que ce soit. Pour finir, il ajuste son manteau taché de sang, se redresse et se met à parler :{/n} « Le second Abélard Werserian est autorisé à informer les officiers... C'est avec le plus grand regret et une tristesse immense que je me vois dans l'obligation de vous apprendre le décès prématuré de la seigneure-capitaine Théodora von Valancius, libre-marchande au service de l'Imperium. Que son souvenir reste à jamais gravé dans les annales de la dynastie. »

languages.text: {n}Abelard braucht etwas Zeit, um zu antworten. Er beißt die Zähne zusammen und scheint unfähig, etwas zu sagen. Schließlich richtet er seinen blutbefleckten Umhang, nimmt Haltung an und beginnt zu sprechen:{/n} "Als Erster Offizier habe ich die Pflicht ... Euch mit größtem Bedauern und unauslöschlicher Trauer zu berichten, dass Lord Captain Theodora von Valancius tot ist. Möge die Erinnerung an sie niemals aus den Annalen der Dynastie getilgt werden."
languages.original_text: {n}It takes time for Abelard to respond: you watch as he grits his teeth, unable to bring himself to say anything. Finally, he adjusts his blood-stained coat, straightens, and begins to speak,{/n} "As First Officer, it is my duty... to inform you, with the greatest regret and indelible sorrow, that Lord Captain Theodora von Valancius is dead. May her memory never fade from the annals of the dynasty."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard braucht etwas Zeit, um zu antworten. Er beißt die Zähne zusammen und scheint unfähig, etwas zu sagen. Schließlich rückt er seinen blutbefleckten Mantel zurecht und spricht:{/n} "Der Erste Offizier Abelard Werserian ist dazu autorisiert, die Offiziere darüber zu informieren ... Mit größtem Bedauern und unsäglicher Trauer muss ich Euch mitteilen, dass Lord Captain Theodora von Valancius, Freihändlerin in Diensten des Imperiums, verstorben ist. Möge die Erinnerung an sie niemals aus den Annalen der Dynastie weichen."

languages.text: {n}Abelard'ın yanıt vermesi zaman alıyor. Dişlerini sıktığını, bir şey söyleyecek gücü bulmakta zorlandığını görüyorsun. En sonunda kanla kaplı ceketini düzeltiyor, duruşunu dikleştirip konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "İkinci Kaptan olarak vazifem gereği... Size büyük bir elemle bildirmem gerekiyor ki, Lord Kaptan Theodora von Valancius'u kaybettik. Anısı, hanedanlığın kayıtlarından asla silinmesin."
languages.original_text: {n}It takes time for Abelard to respond: you watch as he grits his teeth, unable to bring himself to say anything. Finally, he adjusts his blood-stained coat, straightens, and begins to speak,{/n} "As First Officer, it is my duty... to inform you, with the greatest regret and indelible sorrow, that Lord Captain Theodora von Valancius is dead. May her memory never fade from the annals of the dynasty."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard'ın yanıt vermesi zaman alıyor. Dişlerini sıktığını, bir şey söyleyecek gücü bulmakta zorlandığını görüyorsun. En sonunda kanla kaplı ceketini düzeltiyor, duruşunu dikleştirip konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "İkinci Kaptan olarak vazifem gereği... Size büyük bir elemle bildirmem gerekiyor ki, Lord Kaptan Theodora von Valancius'u kaybettik. Anısı, hanedanlığın kayıtlarından asla silinmesin."
